mapper.update:
update tb_user
TrueName = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PayPassword = #{paypassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Alipay = #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WxOpenId = #{wxopenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Coupon = #{coupon,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RemainPoints = #{remainpoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RemainAmount = #{remainamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RemainAmount_USD = #{remainamountUsd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RemainElecNum = #{remainelecnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RemainVIPAmount = #{remainvipamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RemainStream = #{remainstream,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CurStatus = #{curstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
InviteCode = #{invitecode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BeInviteCode = #{beinvitecode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsVIP = #{isvip,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HeadPhoto = #{headphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCardPhoto = #{idcardphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCardPhoto2 = #{idcardphoto2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCardPhoto3 = #{idcardphoto3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCardNo = #{idcardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsAuth = #{isauth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Lev = #{lev,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsSubProxy = #{issubproxy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TotalCost = #{totalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TeamTotalCost = #{teamtotalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SubTeamTotalCost = #{subteamtotalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SysID = #{sysid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AllowFenYong = #{allowfenyong,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ProxyStar = #{proxystar,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select Id from tb_user where UserName = #{username}
select CurStatus,FundStatus from tb_user where UserName = #{username}
select NewExclusive from tb_user where UserName = #{username}
select Id from tb_user where UserName = #{userName} and Password = #{password}
select Id from tb_user where UserName = #{userName} and PayPassword = #{payPassword}
mapper.update: update tb_user set Password = #{password} where UserName = #{userName}
mapper.select: select Id from tb_user where UserName = #{userName}
select UserName from tb_user where Id = #{UserId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_user where InviteCode = #{InviteCode};
SELECT Id UserId,Coupon,RemainPoints,RemainElecNum,RemainVIPAmount,RemainStream,TotalCost FROM tb_user WHERE Id = #{Id} FOR UPDATE;
mapper.update: update tb_user set Coupon = #{Coupon},RemainPoints = #{RemainPoints},RemainElecNum = #{RemainElecNum},RemainVIPAmount = #{RemainVIPAmount},RemainStream = #{RemainStream},TotalCost = #{TotalCost} where Id = #{UserId}
update tb_user set NewExclusive = 1 where UserName = #{UserName} and NewExclusive = 0
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_user where Id = #{id}
SELECT CurStatus from tb_user WHERE Id = #{id}
